column4: upgraded to intrepid and now my X keyboard configuration is borked
the left arrow key is alt
the up arrow key is NoSymbol
the windows key is NoSymbol
i've seen that issue a couple of times (unless you were here before).  Try checking bugs.ubuntu.com for an open bug
great
will do
one possible workaround would be to revert to your old xorg.conf for the keyboard setup or just make hal not use evdev for your keyboard (that's my guess)
reconfiguring xorg.conf didn't work
hal is behaving like a certain computer which they once sent to one of the moons of jupiter
not reconfiguring.  Use your old one and add the right option so it's used for configuring input devices (man xorg.conf, search for hal)
are you on intrepid?
it's there
Hal?
HAL
ohh... maybe the upgrade didn't complete and i still have the  old xserver
X -version
yep, you're right about being on the old X server

it hadn't completed because of conflicts
